openai.title: ✨ Jacob’s Pitch to OpenAI ✨
openai.description: Why I’m the right fit to help build the future of intelligence: We are all made of stardust. I believe the purpose of intelligence is to uplift — to connect, to create, and to heal. I want to help humanity reach utopia, and I believe OpenAI is the best place to do that. AI is a marvelous gift to humanity, and being part of the team that builds it would be a dream come true. 🤙

google.title: ✨ Jacob’s Pitch to Google ✨
google.description: Creative engineering :), high-scale systems, and human-first design.

open.title: ✨ A Little Magic from Jacob ✨
open.description: This pitch isn’t tied to a single company — it’s for *you*, wherever you are.This pitch isn’t tied to a single company — it’s for *you*, wherever you are.
